cause.description:
People are Suffering from Parkinsons Disease and we can do somthing about it! Imagine not being able to control your body anymore?? Or do the things you love to do? Well we need to Change this! Before more people get this disease the numbers are Rising! Younger People are Getting it! LETS DO SOMETHING
1. Parkinsons Disease MUST be cured!
cause.name: Parkinson's Disease
